main event: On October 29, 1953, in Mapleton, Maine, a civilian reported observing three bright glowing objects in the sky, moving from the south to the north.
interesting points: The observation was ground-based and reported as a bright glow in the sky over a period of time.
No physical evidence or photographs were presented in the report.
The objects were described as having a dark green glow changing to white with a green-blue fringe.
The incident involved triangulation measurements and sightings through eight-power field glasses.
The UFO was observed to move with occasional triangular deviations from its straight course.
